context.expression: user.role === 'chw' && user._id !== contact._id && summary.alive && summary.is_family_person && summary.show_women_emergency_form && !summary.muted && contact.type === 'person' && ageInYears(contact) >= 12 && ageInYears(contact) < 60 && (contact.sex === 'female' || contact.sex === 'femme' || contact.sex === 'Femme')
